verbose_text: Because induction of ISG15 was IRF-3-dependent, PKR expression is STAT1 dependent in response to Type I IFN 33, 34, IFNbeta upregulated expression of ISG15, but not PKR in NS5 expressing cells, implying NS5 specifically inhibited STAT1 mediated signaling.
evidence: ISG15, but not PKR in NS5-expressing cells                         , implying NS5 specifically inhibited STAT1
